name: difsymssdifssd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl5ss(cdif(c0, c1), c2, csymdif(c0, c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c1), csymdif(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c1), csymdif(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))

|- wi(w0, wss(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(csymdif(c0, c1), c2))

comment: If the symmetric difference is contained in ` C ` , so is one of the differences. (Contributed by AV, 17-Aug-2022.)
